```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, tmap, tidyverse)
```

```{r}
acled_sf <- read.csv("data/ACLED_Myanmar.csv") %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c(
    "longitude","latitude"),
    crs=4326) %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 32647) %>% 
  mutate(event_date = dmy(event_date))
```
